title: Newcastle agree £30m fee with Lyon to sign Guimaraes
shortDescription: Newcastle have agreed a fee with Lyon in the region of £30m to sign midfielder Bruno Guimaraes.

title: Rangers condemn racist abuse of Ofoborh
shortDescription: Rangers have condemned the "disgraceful" racist abuse sent to Nnamdi Ofoborh as he streamed himself playing games online.

title: Chelsea vs Spurs in WSL rearranged for March 23, live on Sky
shortDescription: Chelsea vs Tottenham in the Women's Super League has been rearranged for Wednesday, March 23, live on Sky Sports.

title: Pereira favourite to be named Everton boss | Lampard remains leading contender
shortDescription: Former Porto boss Vitor Pereira now favourite to be appointed next Everton manager following further talks, as Frank Lampard remains a leading contender for the job.

title: Papa John's Trophy: Arsenal U21 crash out; Wigan, Rotherham advance
shortDescription: Sky Bet League One leaders Wigan continued their fine form as they advanced to the semi-finals of the Papa John's Trophy with a 1-0 win at the DW Stadium on Tuesday.

title: Papa John's Trophy: The state of play
shortDescription: As the 2021/22 Papa John's Trophy reaches its latter stages, we bring you the state of play, upcoming fixtures and the schedule for the remainder of the tournament.

title: Newcastle giving up hope on Lingard | Carlos holding out for deal
shortDescription: Newcastle United have all but given up hope of signing Jesse Lingard on loan from Manchester United.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: QPR held; Forest, Coventry win
shortDescription: QPR missed the chance to move up to third in the Sky Bet Championship after they were held to a goalless draw at home by Swansea.

title: Ronan strike sees St Mirren past Aberdeen
shortDescription: Connor Ronan's second-half strike moved St Mirren three points behind opponents Aberdeen, beating the Dons 1-0 in the Scottish Premiership on Tuesday.

title: Sevilla sign Martial on loan from Man Utd
shortDescription: Sevilla have completed the signing of Anthony Martial on loan from Manchester United.

title: Gyokeres steers Coventry past Stoke
shortDescription: Viktor Gyokeres scored for the first time since early October as he hit the winner in Coventry's 1-0 victory at home to Stoke.

title: Forest cruise past Barnsley
shortDescription: Nottingham Forest rattled off a fourth straight win to see off bottom-of-the-table Barnsley 3-0 in the Sky Bet Championship.
